title: 180 perch land with two storied shop building (7 shops) and 36 room hostel
details:
This property consist of 180 perch land with 63 coconut trees, a two storied shop building (7 shops, approx 2000 sqft) and 36 room-hostel, further this property is located in highly commercial area and the west end of the property is directly facing to baseline line road and the east end to the temple road, The Free Trade Zone Katunayake, Colombo-Katunayake Express-way and BIA (Bandaranayke International Air Port) are within walking distance (approx 600 -800 meters).
This property is highly suitable for super market complex like Keels, Cargills food city etc, banks, hotels, factory or other commercial amenities.
This property is for sale or long term lease
For sale 100 million LKR
For long term lease, 200,000 LKR per month for 5 years, 10 years or more if necessary

Contact 0779751322 if you need more info (genuine buyers only)
